commit.message:
struct-layout-1_generate.c (switchfiles): Use -fno-common when on HPPA HP-UX platforms.

	* gcc.dg/compat/struct-layout-1_generate.c (switchfiles):  Use
	-fno-common when on HPPA HP-UX platforms.

From-SVN: r89107
